snippet: Federal authorities in New York have sued Deutsche Bank and other financial entities, alleging they dodged more than $100 million in taxes with some fancy financial footwork....

headline.print_headline: US Sues Deutsche Bank and Other Banks for $190M
headline.main: US Sues Deutsche Bank and Other Banks for $190M

lead_paragraph: Federal authorities in New York have sued Deutsche Bank and other financial entities, alleging they dodged more than $100 million in taxes with some fancy financial footwork.
